description: A Pinia store module for managing categories in a Vue.js application, including fetching, creating, and retrieving category names.

methods.name: fetchCategories
methods.description: Fetches categories from the backend API and updates the store.

methods.name: createCategory
methods.description: Creates a new category with the given name via API and updates the store.

methods.name: categoryName
methods.description: Returns the name of the category with the given ID, or an empty string if not found.
